display_long_description:
Step into **12th-century Venice** in **Murders in Venetia**, a **narrative VR investigation game**. 
Walk through narrow alleys, visit ancient buildings, **question witnesses**, and **search for clues** to solve **mysterious murders**. 
Designed for **immersive exploration**, the game lets you uncover the truth in a richly detailed **historical setting**. 

# Setting
Built from the ground up for **virtual reality**, **Murders in Venetia** delivers a deep and **atmospheric experience**, 
blending historical intrigue with **investigative gameplay**. 
The story unfolds through your discoveries, with a focus on **observation**, **deduction**, and **environmental storytelling**.

# Early Access
The game is currently available in **Early Access**. 
This release includes the **Prologue** of the main story and introduces players to a portion of the map. 
In future updates, we will expand the narrative with **three additional acts**, each continuing the **investigation** and deepening the mystery, and adding **minigames** to enrich the overall experience.

Join the **investigation** and be part of the journey as **Murders in Venetia** evolves towards its full release.

publisher_name: Digital Tales USA LLC (doing business as Funny Tales)
